Moderation recommended in a sermon preached before the lord mayor and court of aldermen at Guild-Hall Chappel, May 12th, 1689 by George Tullie ... Tullie, George, 1652?-1695.
[8], 26, [2] p.
Printed for Ric. Chiswell ..., London : MDCLXXXIX [1689]
Half title: "Mr. Tullie's sermon of moderation." Running title: A sermon of moderation. "Licensed, June 5th, 1689. Z. Ishan." Includes publisher's list : p. [1]-[2] at end. Imperfect: print show-through. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
